Detailed Description

cvmx_spx::_tpa_acc

SPX_TPA_ACC - TPA watcher byte accumulator

Notes: This field allows the user to access the TPA watcher accumulator counter. This register reflects the number of bytes sent to IMX once the port specified by SPX_TPA_SEL[PRTSEL] has lost its TPA. The SPX_INT_REG[TPAOVR] bit is asserted when CNT >= SPX_TPA_MAX[MAX]. The CNT will continue to increment until the TPA for the port is asserted. At that point the CNT value is frozen until software clears the interrupt bit.
